text: Stickiness or the quality of being sticky can refer to several things: * When something has adhesion and cohesion * the main property of glue * Sticky (economics) * Sticky (comics) * Sticky content on the Web attracts visitors to return to the site and/or spend long periods of time on the same site * Sticky note * Dessert wines are called stickies in Australia. Category:Basic English 850 words
title: Sticky
